ch0016_42_huuro/0101_0701_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! I’m so happy to
see you!
ch0016_42_huuro/0101_0701_02_10:
Let’s have a good flight today and send the
heat flying!
ch0016_42_huuro/7101_0701_01_10:
I try to remember to take care of my skin
whenever I’m flying or in the ocean!
ch0016_42_huuro/7101_0701_02_10: If I don’t, the sun could damage it!
ch0016_42_huuro/7102_0701_01_10:
I’m always so happy when I see Jumpluff
floating on the wind!
ch0016_42_huuro/7102_0701_02_10:
Flying my hardest feels great, but taking it
slow can be nice too!
ch0016_42_huuro/7103_0701_01_10:
Blue water! White clouds! A vast sky
stretching forever!
ch0016_42_huuro/7103_0701_02_10:
Being a pilot is the best, because you can
experience it all at once!
ch0016_42_huuro/7103_0701_03_10: I’m itching to take off right this moment!
ch0016_42_huuro/7104_0701_01_10:
Don’t hot days make you want to dive into
the ocean?
ch0016_42_huuro/7104_0701_02_10:
Running across the sand and diving right
in... Doesn’t swimming in the ocean feel
great?
ch0016_42_huuro/7105_0701_01_10:
On days when the sun’s strong, it’s good to
have a hat.
ch0016_42_huuro/7105_0701_03_10: Want to help me pick out a hat?
ch0016_42_huuro/1701_0701_01_10: Oh! Great timing! I’ve a present for you.
ch0016_42_huuro/1701_0702_01_10: I’ll let you know if I find anything else.
ch0016_42_huuro/2501_0701_01_10: If you were to travel, where would you go?
ch0016_42_huuro/2501_0701_02_10:
Shopping in Kalos’s Lumiose City...
Swimming in Alola’s beautiful waters...
The old towns of Johto would be fun too!
ch0016_42_huuro/2501_0701_03_10:
With so many fascinating regions, it’s hard
to decide!
ch0016_42_huuro/2501_0702_01_10:
As for Unova, Undella Town is a
well-known tourist spot!
ch0016_42_huuro/2501_0702_02_10:
It’s a popular resort bustling with people
trying to escape the summer heat!
ch0016_42_huuro/2501_0702_03_10:
Even now, I can’t forget how nice it feels to
swim in the ocean off Undella.
ch0016_42_huuro/2511_0701_01_10:
Have you ever seen a cloud that looks big
and dense?
ch0016_42_huuro/2511_0701_02_10:
They’re called cumulonimbus. I love how
pretty and impressive they are!
ch0016_42_huuro/2511_0701_03_10:
But they can also dump heavy rain.
Can’t let your guard down around nature!
ch0016_42_huuro/2511_0702_01_10:
Even if it’s pouring rain below, the sky’s a
beautiful blue above the clouds!
ch0016_42_huuro/2511_0702_02_10: That first view when the rain clouds break...
ch0016_42_huuro/2511_0702_03_10: I’d love to show you someday.
ch0016_42_huuro/3001_0701_01_10:
Those sizzling sunbeams... The higher I get,
the hotter they feel!
ch0016_42_huuro/3003_0701_01_10:
Have you been taking care of your skin?
Keep it in mind when you go outside!
ch0016_42_huuro/3005_0701_01_10:
When I look up at the night sky full of
sparkling stars, I forget all my worries—as if
they never existed!
